     <div class="testimonial">
      <h2>
       You said it!
      </h2>
      <blockquote>
       <p>
        ''We went to to a class about pirates over half term. The children were asked where the treasure map was. They all started looking and Jessica and Rex immediately held up an imaginary one saying "Here it is! And look, there's the X that marks the spot!" Who needs props anyway?! Thank you, Pyjama Drama"
        <strong>
         (June 2015)
        </strong>
       </p>
      </blockquote>
     </div>
